column2: "I've finished analyzing the data from before. So, let's run through the events that happened back in Harkotan, shall we."
"The Dark Falz appeared to greet you was the former [Apprentice] from 10 years ago. She matched all of the data we have on her."
"That was the [Apprentice] from 10 years ago? But didn't that Dark Falz disappeared 10 years ago?"
"Never mind... It's nothing. Theoretically speaking, that [Apprentice] might have been a copy created by Double.  "
"According to the reports Regius and our allies have made,  Dark Falz Double has the ability to produce copies of anything at will."
"Although... That ability's supposed to be limited to the things Double has consumed."
"However, [Apprentice] hasn't been consumed... We've seen her showing up on Lillipa numerous times. Something doesn't add up."
"The only reasonable assumption is that the former [Apprentice] that showed up on Harkotan was the fake but..."
"It didn't seem that way to me. She was powerful... Moreso, she felt real."
"If that's what you thought Matoi, it's something that can't be ignored. I think it's best if we look into this."

"
You've received the Matterboard [Hazy Record, Faint Memory].
"
